definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
to be on the verge of tears

sentences.english: I do believe she had eye shadow on.
sentences.chinese: 我懷疑她準是描了黑眼圈。

sentences.english: She saw him who always like joking, after said these words, eyes turned red.
sentences.chinese: 她看見，向來愛說笑的他，說完這話，眼圈紅了。

sentences.english: Periorbital dark circles are often caused by sleep deprivation.
sentences.chinese: 黑眼圈通常是由睡眠不足引起的。

sentences.english: Traditional medicine think black rim of the eye is caused by kidney failure.
sentences.chinese: 傳統醫學認爲黑眼圈是腎虧所致。

sentences.english: You can use a concealer to cover the dark circles around your eyes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用一些遮瑕膏蓋住你眼睛周圍的黑眼圈。

sentences.english: I have a black eye because I get into a fight.
sentences.chinese: 我面上的黑眼圈，是因爲我剛纔打過架。

sentences.english: White-election at Tu foundation black eye, point-coating a thin coating.
sentences.chinese: 選亮白色粉底塗在黑眼圈的地方，點塗法薄薄塗一層。

sentences.english: Eye rim pigment should match the nose.
sentences.chinese: 眼圈的色素與鼻鏡匹配。

sentences.english: She wore heavy makeup to mask the dark circles under her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她化濃妝以掩飾她的黑眼圈。

sentences.english: Minimizes dark circles, reduces fine lines and puffiness .
sentences.chinese: 減少黑眼圈，幼紋和眼袋。

sentences.english: Go into the same bags under the eyes can also dilute the black eye.
sentences.chinese: 去眼袋的同進還能淡化黑眼圈。

sentences.english: Brown hair, black rim of the eye is like wearing a pair of black sunglasses.
sentences.chinese: 棕色的毛，黑黑的眼圈像是戴了一副黑墨鏡。

sentences.english: Lines, puffiness, dark eye circles can be used in four seasons.
sentences.chinese: 紋，浮腫，黑眼圈的人羣四季均可使用。

sentences.english: The phrase wear me out says in Greek give me a black eye.
sentences.chinese: “纏磨我”一詞在希臘文的意思是“使我眼圈變黑”。

sentences.english: The skin, diminish dark circles and puffiness.
sentences.chinese: 肌膚，減輕黑眼圈和浮腫。

sentences.english: This eye cream can release the puffy problem your eyes be having.
sentences.chinese: 這個眼霜可以緩解你眼圈浮腫的問題。

definition: outer or inner corner of the eye/canthus
wisps of blood/visible veins/(of eyes) bloodshot
to choke with emotion/to choke with sobs
